results.content: This course is a good refresher to those that have a basic understanding of human-computer interaction or UX. It does a good job of talking about the process on a project level and what you can expect working in the field. It also provides extra tips to the external barriers to UX. would have liked a little bit more in-depth explanation for visual design and brand design as this meant to be an advances course. Maybe go into details about why we use certain colours and text styles and why we have different fonts and when to use fonts and elements and colour. Other than that it was a great course!
